titleStmt.title: A paper subscribed and delivered by divers eminent and worthy citizens to the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and court of aldermen, at Guild-hall, July the 20th 1682 To the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and court of aldermen.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for E. Smith at the Elephant and Castle in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: "A caveat enter'd by divers eminent citizens .." (Wing C1609) is printed on the verso of "A paper subscribed and delivered ..." (Wing P288). The imprint is taken from Wing C1609.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
